title: Holy Emperor’s Grandson is a Necromancer - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Fantasy   Horror   Mature   Mystery   Shounen   Supernatural
tags: Cheats   Comedic Undertone   Death   Depictions of Cruelty   Divine Protection   Dwarfs   Empires   Evil Gods   Evil Organizations   Evil Religions   Exorcism   Game Elements   Goddesses   Godly Powers   Gods   Grave Keepers   Gunfighters   Hard-Working Protagonist   Hidden Abilities   Hiding True Abilities   Hiding True Identity   Kingdoms   Loyal Subordinates   Magic   Magical Space   Male Protagonist   Misunderstandings   Multiple POV   Necromancer   Overpowered Protagonist   Priests   Protagonist Strong from the Start   Reincarnated in a Game World   Resurrection   Royalty   Saints   Siblings   Strong to Stronger   System Administrator   Transmigration   Unique Weapons   Vampires   Zombies
author: I.C. Han   Shadow-kun   그림자꾼
description: Our MC dies from an accidental electrocution and ends up inhabiting the body of a young prince in another world, his new profession being the Necromancer he chose in the game he was playing before his untimely demise. However, things are not what they seem – including his own Necromancy skills!>
